com.madrobot.ui
Class ColorPickerView

java.lang.Object
  View
      com.madrobot.ui.CustomWidget
          com.madrobot.ui.ColorPickerView

public class ColorPickerView
extends CustomWidget

Displays a color picker to the user and allow them to select a color. A slider for the alpha channel is also available. Enable it by setting setAlphaSliderVisible(boolean) to true.

getDrawingOffset

public float getDrawingOffset()
Get the drawing offset of the color picker view. The drawing offset is the distance from the side of a panel to the side of the view minus the padding. Useful if you want to have your own panel below showing the currently selected color and want to align it perfectly.

Returns:
The offset in pixels.

setAlphaSliderVisible

public void setAlphaSliderVisible(boolean visible)
Set if the user is allowed to adjust the alpha panel. Default is false. If it is set to false no alpha will be set.

Parameters:
visible -

Parameters:
res - string resource id.
